sen.j: 久米邦武筆禍事件（くめくにたけひっかじけん）とは、久米邦武の論文「神道ハ祭天ノ古俗」を1892年（明治25年）に田口卯吉が主宰する『史海』に転載したのをきっかけに問題となり、帝国大学教授職を辞することとなった事件。
sen.e: The Incident of Kunitake KUME was the incident which the historical journal 'Shinto wa saiten no kozoku' (Shinto Is a Remnant of the Ancient Custom of Worshiping Heaven) was reprinted in 1892, in "Shikai" (Ocean of History) which Ukichi TAGUCHI edited, and Kume lost his position as professor at the Imperial University.

sen.j: この問題は、学問の自由（特に歴史学）と国体とのかかわり方について一石を投じた。
sen.e: This incident raised a question for the connection between the academic (especially, historical) freedom and the nation's political system.

sen.e: In January, 1891, Kume published 'Shinto wa saiten no kozoku' in "Journal of the Historical Science".

sen.j: 「余ハ此篇ヲ読ミ、私ニ我邦現今ノアル神道熱心家ハ決シテ緘黙スベキ場合ニアラザルヲ思フ、若シ彼等ニシテ尚ホ緘黙セバ余ハ彼等ハ全ク閉口シタルモノト見做サザルベカラズ」と述べ、神道家を挑発する。
sen.e: He wrote, 'I read the article and believed that true Shintoists in our country must not be silent with this article, if they keep quiet over this issue, I shall assume that they must be overwhelmed.' and provoked the Shintoist.

sen.e: On February 28, 1892, Jikyu KURAMOCHI, Sadao HONGO, Tatsuji FUJINO, and Morio HANYUDA who were a Shintoist pressed Kunitake KUME on the issue.
